universum.studios.android.preference

Class ListPreference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreference<List<T>>
      • universum.studios.android.preference.ListPreference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A type of the items within a list that can this implementation of preference hold and manage its storing/retrieving.

    public final class ListPreference<T>
extends SharedPreference<List<T>>
    A SharedPreference implementation that may be used to manage (store/retrieve) a List preference value within SharedPreferences.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    ArrayPreference

      • putIntoPreferences

        @CheckResult
public static <T> boolean putIntoPreferences(@NonNull
                                                           SharedPreferences preferences,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           String key,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           List<T> list,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           Class<T> componentType)
        Saves the given list into the given shared preferences.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of items which are presented within the given list.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The instance of shared preferences into which will be the given list saved.
        key - The key under which will be the saved list mapped in the shared preferences.
        list - List to save into preferences.
        componentType - Class of components presented within the given list.
        Returns:
        True if saving has succeeded, false otherwise.

      • onGetFromPreferences

        @Nullable
protected List<T> onGetFromPreferences(@NonNull
                                                  SharedPreferences preferences)
        Description copied from class: SharedPreference
        Invoked to retrieve the actual value of this preference from the given shared preferences.
        Specified by:
        onGetFromPreferences in class SharedPreference<List<T>>
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The actual value of this preference from the given shared preferences.
        See Also:
        getFromPreferences(SharedPreferences, String, List)

      • getFromPreferences

        public static <T> List<T> getFromPreferences(@NonNull
                                             SharedPreferences preferences,
                                             @NonNull
                                             String key,
                                             @Nullable
                                             List<T> defValue)
        Returns a List mapped in the given shared preferences under the specified key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of an items which should be presented within the obtained list.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The instance of shared preferences into which was the requested list before saved.
        key - The key under which is the saved list mapped in the shared preferences.
        defValue - Default list to return if there is no mapping for the specified key yet.
        Returns:
        An instance of the requested list or defValue if there is no mapping for the specified key.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - If value stored under the specified key does not represents an array/a list.
        IllegalArgumentException - If type of the requested list is not supported by the Preferences library.
        IllegalStateException - If the requested list was not stored by the Preferences library.
